# to create stats folders run as

sit_setup dm-current

dm-create-folders –dirs stats –mkdir cxij8816

# make idx and smd files

#makeSmallData -e xppf1615 -r 40 #makeSmallData -e xppf1615 -r 41 #makeSmallData -e xppf1615 -r 42

XppMon_Pim1 off -1 display /reg/neh/home/cpo/ana-0.13.12/offbyone/exp=xppf1615:run=42.pdf
